extensionDescription.message: Dormancy 'schläfert' Tabs ein, die eine Zeit lang nicht genutzt wurden. Es stellt die Tabs wieder her, wenn Sie diese das nächste mal nutzen.

optionTimeout.description: Label for option for how many minutes to wait before putting tabs to sleep.

optionActiveWindow.message: Halte das aktive Fenster am Leben
optionActiveWindow.description: Label for option for whether to put tabs to sleep in the active window.

menuGroup.description: Menu group for the extension at tab context.

menuDiscardSelected.description: Menu item to put all selected / highlighted tabs to sleep.

menuDiscardLeft.description: Menu item to put tabs to the left in the same window to sleep.

menuDiscardRight.description: Menu item to put tabs to the right in the same window to sleep.

menuDiscardOther.description: Menu item to put all other tabs in the same window to sleep.
